snippet.title: The Great Book Of Mario [Intro Cutscene]
snippet.description:
This is the intro cutscene to my badly translated mod of Super Paper Mario.
Before you ask, Count Bleck's texture looks the way it does because of story reasons. You will understand more in my playthrough of chapter one once this mod is completed.
